description: GinsFSM, a library to develop systems based in finite-state machines. Its a communication framework, including a full asynchronous httpwsgiwinsocketsockjs server. Ideal for working with Pyramid using traversal dispatch.

info.Keywords:: framework communication fsm finite state machine fsm wsgi http socket poll epoll kqueue select server client workflow pyramid websocket sockjs

longdescription: GinsFSM, a library to develop systems based in finite-state machines. Its a communication framework, including a full asynchronous httpwsgiwinsocketsockjs server. Ideal for working with Pyramid using traversal dispatch.
